WHO WE ARE

Learn more about our family of companies

STANDARD COMPUTER SYSTEMS, INC. has been providing IT solutions for corporations, non-profit organizations, small businesses and home users in the West Michigan area, and beyond, since 1985. Professional solutions include network installation and support, managed services, and PC sales & repair; among many others.

Learn More

OFFICE AUTOMATION GROUP at Standard Computer Systems offers a wide selection of copy, print, scan and fax solutions to a wide variety of clients. From equipment lease management, to ink, toner & supplies management, to service and sales, the OA Group keeps organizations up and running throughout the West Michigan area.

Learn More

DATA CONSULTANTS delivers complete security solutions to clients throughout North America. Solutions are implemented using a holistic approach to securing people, facilities, assets and data, in a way that strengthens business operations. Data Consultants also specializes in SCADA systems and compliance with safety and regulatory requirements.

Learn More

K-DATA SYSTEMS provides web development and design services, data center solutions and a complete line of internet security products and services. Developed to meet web and network needs, K-Data Systems helps clients across the country stay ahead of the game with cutting edge solutions.

Learn More

RIVERVIEW SERVICE offers sustainable life safety solutions for facilities and people throughout North America. Specializing in engineering, installing, and maintaining specialty systems, Riverview Service works to satisfy both unique customer operational requirements and applicable AHJ requirements.

Learn More

K Group Companies has been providing technology solutions to clients in West Michigan since 1980, and has since expanded its reach to serve corporations, small businesses, and non-profit organizations around the world.

Learn More

Cookie Settings Login
×

This website is using cookies.

We use them to give you the best experience. By using our site, you acknowledge that you have read and understand our Cookie Policy, Privacy Policy, and our Terms of Service. Your use of this website, is subject to these policies and terms.

Accept Cookie Settings Learn more
×

Cookie Settings

Cookie Policy

HTTP cookie, is a simple text file that is stored in a web browser while a user views a website. When a user browses the same site in the future, the site may extract or retrieve information stored in the cookie in order to be informed of the previous user activity. Cookies can contain information about the pages that user visits, login details, and which buttons the user has clicked on. This data can remain in the cookie for months, even years. The main purpose of cookies is to improve usability of a website.

Necessary Cookies

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

Cookies Used

Name
Description
Expiration
AcceptCookies
Used to save that user acknowledged cookie message so it won't show again.
365 Days
AcceptPerformanceCookies
Used to acknowledge user consents to using performance/statistics cookies.
365 Days
.ASPXANONYMOUS
Used to deliver anonymous user details when authorizing applications on the website.
69 Days
authentication
Forms authentication cookie (created when a user logs in).
Session
dnn_IsMobile
Used to determine if the visitor is browsing from a mobile device.
Session
.DOTNETNUKE
Necessary for site functionality, including forms authentication, created when a user logs in.
Session
language
Used to store the current language set.
Session
LastPageId
Used to save the user's last page id that was visited.
Session
StayInEditMode
Used to determine the UI state across postbacks (whether or not to reload the page with the 'Editing' interface).
Session
__RequestVerificationToken
Anti forgery token
Session

Performance/Statistics Cookies

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

Cookies Used

Name
Description
Expiration
_ga
Registers a unique ID that is used to generate statistical data on how the visitor uses the website.
2 years
_gid
Registers a unique ID that is used to generate statistical data on how the visitor uses the website.
Session
_gat
Used by Google Analytics to throttle request rate
Session
